mapper.select: SELECT roomId,A.service_no,room_title,room_status,room_host,room_user,review_id,user_name,A.reg_date,img,price,rv_state,A.content FROM (SELECT c.room_id AS roomId, c.service_no, c.room_title, c.room_status, c.room_host, c.room_user, r.review_id, r.user_name, r.reg_date, r.img, r.content FROM chatroom c, review r WHERE c.room_id=r.room_id) A, market m WHERE m.service_no = A.service_no AND room_status=#{rv_state} ORDER BY roomId DESC limit 20 OFFSET #{page};;
mapper.update: UPDATE market SET rv_state = 4 WHERE service_no = #{service_no}
